name: Can Your Pet Escape
description:
Where's the key?
Can you help me escape from the room?

Easy and fun room escape game.
Using the item Find the "key" from a variety of stage!

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and drop items to use them.

FEATURES
• No WIFI
- Enjoy escape puzzle anytime, anywhere!

• Small size game
- You can download 13MB

• Slapstick comedy
- This game centers on a rivalry between two characters chick and chef.

E-MAIL
• scaryama@hotmail.com
- Game made by one person

Website
• http://canyour.pet

Like us on FACEBOOK
• https://www.facebook.com/canyourpetOfficial/

Thank you!
